thread.title: BRIEF-Sandy Lake Gold Declares Event Of Force Majeure In Respect Of Weebigee Project

title: BRIEF-Sandy Lake Gold Declares Event Of Force Majeure In Respect Of Weebigee Project

organizations.name: brief-sandy lake gold declares event of force

text:
April 23, 2018 / 11:50 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Sandy Lake Gold Declares Event Of Force Majeure In Respect Of Weebigee Project Reuters Staff 
April 23 (Reuters) - Sandy Lake Gold Inc: 
* SANDY LAKE GOLD INC. DECLARES EVENT OF FORCE MAJEURE IN RESPECT OF WEEBIGEE PROJECT 
* SANDY LAKE GOLD - EVENT OF FORCE MAJEURE RESULTS FROM INABILITY OF CO TO WORK ON OR NEAR LAND RELATING TO PROPERTY LOCATED IN NORTHWEST ONTARIO 
* SANDY LAKE GOLD - DECLARED EVENT OF FORCE MAJEURE PURSUANT TO OPTION AGREEMENT BETWEEN GPM METALS, GOLDEYE EXPLORATIONS LIMITED DATED APRIL 15, 2015 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
